title: Fairly heavy rainfall above 75mm expected in parts of the island
content: Northern, North-Central, Eastern and Uva provinces, and Hambantota and Matale districts will experience showers today, says the Department of Meteorology.Fairly heavy showers above 75mm can be expected at some places in Northern, North-Central and Eastern provinces.Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places elsewhere during the evening or night.
